name: Wooper
flavorText:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

previous.name: Yanma
previous.flavorText:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

next.name: Quagsire
next.flavorText:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

pokemon.name: Clodsire
pokemon.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.
